XXsspp2_3u:0: atha khalu teṣāṃ devaputrāṇām etad abhūt: kīdṛgrūpāḥ subhūteḥ sthavirasya
XXsspp2_3u:2: athāyuṣmān subhūtis teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya tān devaputrān etad avocat: māyopamā me devaputrā dharmadeśanā māyopamā me
XXsspp2_3u:3: devaputrā dhārmaśravaṇikā eṣṭavyāḥ. nirmitopamā me devaputrā dharmadeśanā nirmitopamā me devaputrā dhārmaśravaṇikā eṣṭavyāḥ. te naiva kiṃcic
XXsspp2_3u:5: atha khalu devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocan: kiṃ punar bhadanta
XXsspp2_3u:6: subhūte māyopamās te sattvā māyopamās te dhārmaśravaṇikā, nirmitopamās te sattvā nirmitopamās te dhārmaśravaṇikāḥ.
XXsspp2_3u:7: subhūtir āha: evam etad devaputrā evam etad, māyopamās te sattvā māyopamās te dhārmaśravaṇikā, nirmitopamās te sattvā nirmitopamās te dhārmaśravaṇikāḥ. svapnopamās te devaputrāḥ sattvāḥ, māyopamās te devaputrāḥ sattvāḥ.
XXsspp2_3u:8: rūpam api devaputrāḥ svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ, vedanāpi devaputrāḥ svapnopamā
XXsspp2_3u:9: māyopamā, saṃjñāpi devaputrāḥ svapnopamā māyopamā, saṃskārā api devaputrāḥ
XXsspp2_3u:10: svapnopamā māyopamāḥ, vijñānam api devaputrāḥ svapnopamaṃ māyopamam.
XXsspp2_3u:11: cakṣur api svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ, śrotram api svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ,
XXsspp2_3u:12: ghrāṇam api svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ, jihvāpi svapnopamā māyopamā, kāyo 'pi
XXsspp2_3u:14: rūpam api svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ, śabdo 'pi svapnopamo māyopamaḥ, gandho
XXsspp2_3u:15: 'pi svapnopamo māyopamaḥ, raso 'pi svapnopamo māyopamaḥ, sparśo 'pi
XXsspp2_3u:16: svapnopamo māyopamaḥ, dharmā api svapnopamā māyopamāḥ.
XXsspp2_3u:17: cakṣurvijñānam api svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ, śrotravijñānam api (ŚsP_II-3_2)
XXsspp2_3u:18: svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ, ghrāṇavijñānam api svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ,
XXsspp2_3u:19: jihvāvijñānam api svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ, kāyavijñānam api svapnopamaṃ
XXsspp2_3u:25: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajāpi vedanā svapnopamā māyopamā, śrotrasaṃsparśajāpi vedanā svapnopamā māyopamā, ghrāṇasaṃsparśajāpi vedanā svapnopamā māyopamā,
XXsspp2_3u:26: jihvāsaṃsparśajāpi vedanā svapnopamā māyopamā, kāyasaṃsparśajāpi vedanā svapnopamā māyopamā, manaḥsaṃsparśajāpi vedanā svapnopamā māyopamā.
XXsspp2_3u:27: pṛthivīdhātur api svapnopamo māyopamaḥ, abdhātur api svapnopamo māyopamaḥ,
XXsspp2_3u:28: tejodhātur api svapnopamo māyopamaḥ, vāyudhātur api svapnopamo māyopamaḥ,
XXsspp2_3u:29: ākāśadhātur api svapnopamo māyopamaḥ, vijñānadhātur api svapnopamo
XXsspp2_3u:31: avidyāpi svapnopamā māyopamā, saṃskārā api svapnopamā māyopamāḥ, vijñānam api svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ, nāmarūpam api svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ,
XXsspp2_3u:32: ṣaḍāyatanam api svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ, sparśo 'pi svapnopamo māyopamaḥ,
XXsspp2_3u:33: vedanāpi svapnopamā māyopamā, tṛṣṇāpi svapnopamā māyopamā, upādānam api svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ, bhavo 'pi svapnopamo māyopamaḥ, jātir api svapnopamā māyopamā, jarāmaraṇam api svapnopamaṃ māyopamam.
XXsspp2_3u:34: dānapāramitāpi svapnopamā māyopamā, śīlapāramitāpi svapnopamā māyopamā,
XXsspp2_3u:35: kṣāntipāramitāpi svapnopamā māyopamā, vīryapāramitāpi svapnopamā māyopamā,
XXsspp2_3u:36: dhyānapāramitāpi svapnopamā māyopamā, prajñāpāramitāpi svapnopamā māyopamā.
XXsspp2_3u:37: adhyātmaśūnyatāpi svapnopamā māyopamā, bahirdhāśūnyatāpi svapnopamā māyopamā, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāpi svapnopamā māyopamā, śūnyatāśūnyatāpi svapnopamā māyopamā, mahāśūnyatāpi svapnopamā māyopamā,
XXsspp2_3u:38: paramārthaśūnyatāpi svapnopamā māyopamā, saṃskṛtaśūnyatāpi svapnopamā māyopamā, asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāpi svapnopamā māyopamā, atyantaśūnyatāpi svapnopamā māyopamā, anavarāgraśūnyatāpi svapnopamā māyopamā,
XXsspp2_3u:39: anavakāraśūnyatāpi svapnopamā māyopamā, (ŚsP_II-3_3) prakṛtiśūnyatāpi svapnopamā māyopamā, sarvadharmaśūnyatāpi svapnopamā māyopamā,
XXsspp2_3u:40: svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāpi svapnopamā māyopamā, anupalambhaśūnyatāpi svapnopamā māyopamā, abhāvaśūnyatāpi svapnopamā māyopamā, svabhāvaśūnyatāpi svapnopamā māyopamā, abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāpi svapnopamā māyopamā.
XXsspp2_3u:41: smṛtyupasthānāny api svapnopamāni māyopamāni, samyakprahāṇāny api svapnopamāni māyopamāni, ṛddhipādā api svapnopamā māyopamā, indriyāṇy api svapnopamāni māyopamāni, balāny api svapnopamāni māyopamāni, bodhyaṅgāny api svapnopamāni māyopamāni, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo 'pi svapnopamo māyopamaḥ,
XXsspp2_3u:42: āryasatyāny api svapnopamāni māyopamāni, dhyānāny api svapnopamāni
XXsspp2_3u:43: māyopamāni, apramāṇāny api svapnopamāni māyopamāni, ārūpyasamāpattayo 'pi
XXsspp2_3u:44: svapnopamā māyopamāḥ, vimokṣā api svapnopamā māyopamāḥ,
XXsspp2_3u:46: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāny api svapnopamāni māyopamāni, abhijñā api svapnopamā māyopamāḥ, samādhayo 'pi svapnopamā māyopamāḥ,
XXsspp2_3u:47: dhāraṇīmukhāny api svapnopamāni māyopamāni, tathāgatabalāny api svapnopamāni māyopamāni, vaiśāradyāny api svapnopamāni māyopamāni,
XXsspp2_3u:48: pratisaṃvido 'pi svapnopamā māyopamāḥ, mahāmaitryāpi svapnopamā māyopamā,
XXsspp2_3u:49: mahākaruṇāpi svapnopamā māyopamā, āveṇikabuddhadharmā api svapnopamā
XXsspp2_3u:51: srotaāpattiphalam api svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ, sakṛdāgāmiphalam api svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ, anāgāmiphalam api svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ, arhattvam api svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ, pratyekabodhir api svapnopamā māyopamā,
XXsspp2_3u:53: atha te devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocan: bodhir api subhūte
XXsspp2_3u:54: svapnopamā māyopamā vadasi. tat kiṃ nirvāṇam api svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ
XXsspp2_3u:56: subhūtir āha: nirvāṇam apy ahaṃ devaputrāḥ svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ vadāmi,
XXsspp2_3u:57: sacet tato nirvāṇād anyaḥ kaścid dharmo viśiṣṭataro bhavet, tam apy ahaṃ
XXsspp2_3u:58: svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ vadeyam. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi devaputrāḥ
XXsspp2_3u:59: svapnaś ca māyā ca nirvāṇaṃ cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
XXsspp2_3u:61: āyuṣmāṃś ca mahākauṣṭhilyaḥ, āyuṣmāṃś ca mahākātyāyanaḥ, āyuṣmāṃś ca pūrṇamaitrāyaṇīputraḥ, āyuṣmāṃś ca mahākāśyapo 'nekāni ca bodhisattvasahasrāṇy āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim evam āhuḥ: ke 'syā bhadanta subhūte gambhīrāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃdurdṛśāyā evaṃduranubodhāyā
XXsspp2_3u:62: evaṃśāntāyā evaṃnipuṇāyā evaṃsūkṣmāyā evaṃpraṇītāyāḥ pratyeṣitāro bhavanti?
XXsspp2_3u:63: athāyuṣmāṃ subhūtis tān mahāśrāvakān tāñ ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān etad
XXsspp2_3u:64: avocat: avaivartikā āyuṣmanto bodhisattvā mahāsattvā asyā evaṃgambhīrāyā
XXsspp2_3u:65: evamatarkāyā evamatarkāvacarāyā evaṃsūkṣmāyā evaṃnipuṇāyā evaṃdurdṛśāyā evaṃduranubodhāyā evaṃśāntāyā evaṃpraṇītāyā evamalamāryāyā evaṃpaṇḍitavijñavedanīyāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pratyeṣitāro bhavanti.
XXsspp2_3u:66: dṛṣṭasatyā vā pudgalā arhanto vā kṣīṇāsravāḥ paripūrṇasaṃkalpāḥ pūrvajinakṛtādhikārāś ca sattvā bahubuddhakoṭīṣv avaropitakuśalamūlāḥ kalyāṇamitraparigṛhītāś ca kulaputrā kuladuhitaraś ca ye 'syāḥ
XXsspp2_3u:67: prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃgambhīrāyā evamatarkāyā evamatarkāvacarāyā evaṃsūkṣmāyā evaṃnipuṇāyā evaṃdudṛśāyā evaṃduranubodhāyā evaṃśāntāyā evaṃpraṇītāyā evamalamāryāyā evaṃpaṇḍitavijñavedanīyāyā deśyamānāyāḥ pratyeṣitāro bhaviṣyanti.

XXsspp2_3u:80: na rūpam anutpādam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānutpādaṃ rūpam iti
XXsspp2_3u:81: vikalpayiṣyanti, na vedanām anutpādam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānutpādaṃ vedaneti vikalpayiṣyanti, na saṃjñām anutpādam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,

XXsspp2_3u:106: iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāpraṇihitaṃ kāya iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na mano 'praṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāpraṇihitaṃ mana iti vikalpayiṣyanti,

XXsspp2_3u:335: na sparśam anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodhaṃ sparśa iti
XXsspp2_3u:336: (ŚsP_II-3_18) vikalpayiṣyanti, na vedanām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:337: nānirodhaṃ vedaneti vikalpayiṣyanti, na tṛṣṇām anirodha iti
XXsspp2_3u:338: vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodhaṃ tṛṣṇeti vikalpayiṣyanti, nopādānam anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodham upādānam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na bhavam anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodhaṃ bhava iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na jātim anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodhaṃ jātir iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:339: na jarāmaraṇam anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodhaṃ jarāmaraṇam iti

XXsspp2_3u:344: nopādānaṃ śāntam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntam upādānam iti
XXsspp2_3u:345: vikalpayiṣyanti, na bhavaṃ śānta iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntaṃ bhava iti
XXsspp2_3u:346: vikalpayiṣyanti, na jātiṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntaṃ jātir iti
XXsspp2_3u:347: vikalpayiṣyanti, na jarāmaraṇaṃ śāntam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntaṃ jarāmaraṇam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,

XXsspp2_3u:355: vikalpayiṣyanti, na bhavaṃ vivikta iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktaṃ bhava
XXsspp2_3u:356: iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na jātiṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktaṃ jātir
XXsspp2_3u:357: iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na jarāmaraṇaṃ viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktaṃ jarāmaraṇam iti vikalpayiṣyanti.

XXsspp2_3u:426: na mahāśūnyatām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānutpādaṃ mahāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, na paramārthaśūnyatām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:427: nānutpādaṃ paramārthaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, na saṃskṛtaśūnyatām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānutpādaṃ saṃskṛtaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:428: nānutpādam asaṃskṛtaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, nātyantaśūnyatām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānutpādam atyanaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:429: nānavarāgraśūnyatām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānutpādam anavarāgraśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānavakāraśūnyatām anutpāda iti
XXsspp2_3u:430: vikalpayiṣyanti, nānutpādam anavakāraśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, na prakṛtiśūnyatām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānutpādaṃ prakṛtiśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, na sarvadharmaśūnyatām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:431: nānutpādaṃ sarvadharmaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, na svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānutpādaṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānupalambhaśūnyatām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:432: nānutpādam anupalambhaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, nābhāvaśūnyatām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānutpādam abhāvaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, na svabhāvaśūnyatām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānutpādaṃ svabhāvaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām anutpāda iti
XXsspp2_3u:434: nādhyātmaśūnyatām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodham adhyātmaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, na bahirdhāśūnyatām anirodha iti
XXsspp2_3u:436: nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodham adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatāśūnyatām anirodha iti
XXsspp2_3u:437: vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodhaṃ śūnyatāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, na mahāśūnyatām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodhaṃ mahāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, na paramārthaśūnyatām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:438: nānirodhaṃ paramārthaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, na saṃskṛtaśūnyatām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodhaṃ saṃskṛtaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:440: nātyantaśūnyatām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodham atyantaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānavarāgraśūnyatām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:441: nānirodham anavarāgraśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānavakāraśūnyatām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodham anavakāraśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, na prakṛtiśūnyatām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:442: nānirodhaṃ prakṛtiśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, na sarvadharmaśūnyatām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodhaṃ sarvadharmaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, na svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:443: nānirodhaṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānupalambhaśūnyatām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodham anupalambhaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, nābhāvaśūnyatām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodham abhāvaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, na svabhāvaśūnyatām anirodha iti
XXsspp2_3u:445: nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodham abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:446: nādhyātmaśūnyatāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntam adhyātmaśūnyateti
XXsspp2_3u:447: vikalpayiṣyanti, na bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntaṃ bahirdhāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntam adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatāśūnyatāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntaṃ śūnyatāśūnyateti
XXsspp2_3u:448: vikalpayiṣyanti, na mahāśūnyatāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntaṃ mahāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, na paramārthaśūnyatāṃ śānteti
XXsspp2_3u:449: vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntaṃ paramārthaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, na saṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntaṃ saṃskṛtaśūnyateti
XXsspp2_3u:450: vikalpayiṣyanti, nāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntam asaṃskṛtaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, nātyantaśūnyatāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntam atyantaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:451: nānavarāgraśūnyatāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntam anavarāgraśūnyateti
XXsspp2_3u:452: vikalpayiṣyanti, nānavakāraśūnyatāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntam anavakāraśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, na prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ śānteti
XXsspp2_3u:453: vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntaṃ prakṛtiśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, na sarvadharmaśūnyatāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntaṃ sarvadharmaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, na svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāṃ śānteti
XXsspp2_3u:455: nānupalambhaśūnyatāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntam anupalambhaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, nābhāvaśūnyatāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti, (ŚsP_II-3_25) na śāntam abhāvaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:456: na svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntaṃ svabhāvaśūnyateti
XXsspp2_3u:457: vikalpayiṣyanti, nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntam abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyateti
XXsspp2_3u:458: nādhyātmaśūnyatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktam adhyātmaśūnyateti
XXsspp2_3u:459: vikalpayiṣyanti, na bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktaṃ bahirdhāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktam adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyateti
XXsspp2_3u:460: vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatāśūnyatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktaṃ śūnyatāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, na mahāśūnyatāṃ vivikteti
XXsspp2_3u:461: vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktaṃ mahāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, na paramārthaśūnyatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktaṃ paramārthaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, na saṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ vivikteti
XXsspp2_3u:463: nāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktam asaṃskṛtaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, nātyantaśūnyatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktam atyantaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:464: nānavarāgraśūnyatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktam anavarāgraśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānavakāraśūnyatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktam anavakāraśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, na prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktaṃ prakṛtiśūnyateti
XXsspp2_3u:465: vikalpayiṣyanti, na sarvadharmaśūnyatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktaṃ sarvadharmaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, na svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktaṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyateti
XXsspp2_3u:466: vikalpayiṣyanti, nānupalambhaśūnyatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktam anupalambhaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, nābhāvaśūnyatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktam abhāvaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti, na svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktaṃ svabhāvaśūnyateti
XXsspp2_3u:467: vikalpayiṣyanti, nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktam abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyateti
XXsspp2_3u:468: na smṛtyupasthānāni śūnyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatāṃ smṛtyupasthānānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na smṛtyupasthānāny ānimittānīti
XXsspp2_3u:469: vikalpayiṣyanti, nānimittāṃ smṛtyupasthānānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na smṛtyupasthānāny apraṇihitānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāpraṇihitaṃ smṛtyupasthānānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na smṛtyupasthānāny anutpāda iti
XXsspp2_3u:470: vikalpayiṣyanti, (ŚsP_II-3_26) nānutpādaṃ smṛtyupasthānānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na smṛtyupasthānāny anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:471: nānirodhaṃ smṛtyupasthānānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na smṛtyupasthānāni śāntānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntaṃ smṛtyupasthānānīti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:472: na smṛtyupasthānāni viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktaṃ smṛtyupasthānānīti vikalpayiṣyanti.
XXsspp2_3u:473: na samyakprahāṇāni śūnyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatāṃ samyakprahāṇānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na samyakprahāṇāny ānimittānīti
XXsspp2_3u:474: vikalpayiṣyanti, nānimittaṃ samyakprahāṇānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na samyakprahāṇāny apraṇihitānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāpraṇihitaṃ samyakprahāṇānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na samyakprahāṇāny anutpāda iti
XXsspp2_3u:475: vikalpayiṣyanti, nānutpādaṃ samyakprahāṇānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na samyakprahāṇāny anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodhaṃ samyakprahāṇānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na samyakprahāṇāni śāntānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntaṃ samyakprahāṇānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na samyakprahāṇāni viviktānīti
XXsspp2_3u:477: narddhipādān śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatām ṛddhipādā iti
XXsspp2_3u:478: vikalpayiṣyanti, narddhipādān ānimitta iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānimittam ṛddhipādā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, narddhipādān apraṇihita iti
XXsspp2_3u:479: vikalpayiṣyanti, nāpraṇihitam ṛddhipādā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, narddhipādān anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānutpādam ṛddhipādā iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:480: narddhipādān anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodham ṛddhipādā iti
XXsspp2_3u:481: vikalpayiṣyanti, narddhipādān śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntam ṛddhipādā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, narddhipādān viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:483: nendriyāṇi śūnyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatām indriyāṇīti
XXsspp2_3u:484: vikalpayiṣyanti, nendriyāṇy ānimittānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānimittam indriyāṇīti vikalpayiṣyanti, nendriyāṇy apraṇihitānīti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:485: nāpraṇihitam indriyāṇīti vikalpayiṣyanti, nendriyāṇy anutpāda iti
XXsspp2_3u:486: vikalpayiṣyanti, nānutpādam indriyāṇīti vikalpayiṣyanti, nendriyāṇy anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodham indriyāṇīti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:487: nendriyāṇi śāntānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntam indriyāṇīti
XXsspp2_3u:488: vikalpayiṣyanti, nendriyāṇi viviktānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktam indriyāṇīti vikalpayiṣyanti.
XXsspp2_3u:489: na balāni śūnyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatāṃ balānīti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:490: na balāny ānimittānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānimittaṃ balānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, (ŚsP_II-3_27) na balāny apraṇihitānīti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:491: nāpraṇihitaṃ balānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na balāny anutpāda iti
XXsspp2_3u:492: vikalpayiṣyanti, nānutpādaṃ balānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na balāny anirodha
XXsspp2_3u:493: iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodhaṃ balānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na balāni śāntam
XXsspp2_3u:494: iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntaṃ balānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na balāni viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktaṃ balānīti vikalpayiṣyanti.
XXsspp2_3u:495: na bodhyaṅgāni śūnyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatāṃ bodhyaṅgānīti
XXsspp2_3u:496: vikalpayiṣyanti, na bodhyaṅgāny ānimittānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānimittaṃ bodhyaṅgānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na bodhyaṅgāny apraṇihitānīti
XXsspp2_3u:497: vikalpayiṣyanti, nāpraṇihitaṃ bodhyaṅgānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na bodhyaṅgāny anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānutpādaṃ bodhyaṅgānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na bodhyaṅgāny anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodhaṃ bodhyaṅgānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na bodhyaṅgāni śāntānīti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:498: na śāntaṃ bodhyaṅgānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na bodhyaṅgāni viviktānīti
XXsspp2_3u:500: nāryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgaṃ śūnyata iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatām āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ
XXsspp2_3u:501: mārga iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgam ānimitta iti
XXsspp2_3u:502: vikalpayiṣyanti, nānimittaṃ āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārga iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:503: nāryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgam apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāpraṇihitam āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārga iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgam anutpāda iti
XXsspp2_3u:504: vikalpayiṣyanti, nānutpādam āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārga iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:505: nāryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgam anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodham āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārga iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgaṃ śānta iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:506: na śāntam āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārga iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgaṃ vivikta iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktam āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārga iti vikalpayiṣyanti.
XXsspp2_3u:507: nāryasatyāni śūnyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatām āryasatyānīti
XXsspp2_3u:508: vikalpayiṣyanti, nāryasatyāny ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānimittam āryasatyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāryasatyāny apraṇihitānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāpraṇihitam āryasatyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāryasatyāny anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānutpādam āryasatyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:509: nāryasatyāny anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodham āryasatyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāryasatyāni śāntānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntam āryasatyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāryasatyāni viviktānīti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:511: na dhyānāni śūnyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatāṃ dhyānānīti
XXsspp2_3u:512: vikalpayiṣyanti, na dhyānāny ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānimittaṃ dhyānānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na dhyānāny apraṇihitānīti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:513: nāpraṇihitaṃ dhyānānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na dhyānāny anutpāda iti
XXsspp2_3u:514: vikalpayiṣyanti, nānutpādaṃ dhyānānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na dhyānāny anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodhaṃ dhyānānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na dhyānāni śāntānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntaṃ dhyānānīti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:515: na dhyānāni viviktānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktaṃ dhyānānīti
XXsspp2_3u:517: nāpramāṇāni śūnyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatām apramāṇānīti
XXsspp2_3u:518: vikalpayiṣyanti, nāpramāṇāny ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānimittam apramāṇānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāpramāṇāny apraṇihitānīti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:519: nāpraṇihitam apramāṇānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāpramāṇāny anutpāda iti
XXsspp2_3u:520: vikalpayiṣyanti, nānutpādam apramāṇānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāpramāṇāny anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodham apramāṇānīti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:521: nāpramāṇāni śāntānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntam apramāṇānīti
XXsspp2_3u:522: vikalpayiṣyanti, nāpramāṇāni viviktānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktam apramāṇānīti vikalpayiṣyanti.
XXsspp2_3u:523: nārūpyasamāpattīḥ śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatām ārūpyasamāpattaya
XXsspp2_3u:524: iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nārūpyasamāpattīr ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:525: nānimittam ārūpyasamāpattaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nārūpyasamāpattīr apraṇihitānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāpraṇihitam ārūpyasamāpattaya iti
XXsspp2_3u:527: nānutpādam ārūpyasamāpattaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nārūpyasamāpattīr anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodham ārūpyasamāpattaya iti
XXsspp2_3u:528: vikalpayiṣyanti, nārūpyasamāpattīḥ śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntam ārūpyasamāpattaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nārūpyasamāpattīr viviktā iti
XXsspp2_3u:529: vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktam ārūpyasamāpattaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti.
XXsspp2_3u:530: nāṣṭau vimokṣān śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatām aṣṭau vimokṣā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāṣṭau vimokṣān ānimittā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānimittam aṣṭau vimokṣā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāṣṭau vimokṣān apraṇihitā iti
XXsspp2_3u:531: vikalpayiṣyanti, nāpraṇihitam aṣṭau vimokṣā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāṣṭau vimokṣān anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānutpādam aṣṭau vimokṣā iti
XXsspp2_3u:533: vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodham aṣṭau vimokṣā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāṣṭau vimokṣān śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntam aṣṭau vimokṣā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāṣṭau vimokṣān viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktam aṣṭau vimokṣā iti vikalpayiṣyanti.
XXsspp2_3u:534: na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīḥ śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr ānimittā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānimittaṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr apraṇihitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāpraṇihitaṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānutpādaṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodhaṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīḥ śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntaṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktaṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti.
XXsspp2_3u:535: na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni śūnyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatāṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāny ānimittānīti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:536: nānimittaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāny apraṇihitānīti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:537: nāpraṇihitaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāny anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:538: nānutpādaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāny anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:539: nānirodhaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni śāntānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni viviktānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānīti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:540: nābhijñāḥ śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatām abhijñā iti
XXsspp2_3u:541: vikalpayiṣyanti, nābhijñā ānimittā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānimittam abhijñā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nābhijñā apraṇihitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāpraṇihitam abhijñā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nābhijñā anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:542: nānutpādam (ŚsP_II-3_30) abhijñā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nābhijñā anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodham abhijñā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nābhijñāḥ śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntam abhijñā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nābhijñā viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktam abhijñā iti vikalpayiṣyanti.
XXsspp2_3u:543: na samādhīn śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatāṃ samādhaya iti
XXsspp2_3u:544: vikalpayiṣyanti, na samādhīn ānimittā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānimittaṃ samādhaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na samādhīn apraṇihitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:545: nāpraṇihitaṃ samādhaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na samādhīn anutpāda iti
XXsspp2_3u:546: vikalpayiṣyanti, nānutpādaṃ samādhaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na samādhīn anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodhaṃ samādhaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na samādhīn śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntaṃ samādhaya iti
XXsspp2_3u:547: vikalpayiṣyanti, na samādhīn viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktaṃ samādhaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti.
XXsspp2_3u:548: na dhāraṇīmukhāni śūnyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatāṃ dhāraṇīmukhānīti
XXsspp2_3u:550: nānimittaṃ dhāraṇīmukhānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na dhāraṇīmukhāny apraṇihitānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāpraṇihitaṃ dhāraṇīmukhānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na dhāraṇīmukhāny anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:551: nānutpādaṃ dhāraṇīmukhānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na dhāraṇīmukhāny anirodha
XXsspp2_3u:552: iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodhaṃ dhāraṇīmukhānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na dhāraṇīmukhāni śāntānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntaṃ dhāraṇīmukhānīti
XXsspp2_3u:553: vikalpayiṣyanti, na dhāraṇīmukhāni viviktānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktaṃ dhāraṇīmukhānīti
XXsspp2_3u:554: na daśatathāgatabalāni śūnyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatāṃ daśatathāgatabalānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na daśatathāgatabalāny ānimittānīti
XXsspp2_3u:555: vikalpayiṣyanti, nānimittaṃ daśatathāgatabalānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na daśatathāgatabalāny apraṇihitānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāpraṇihitaṃ daśatathāgatabalānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na daśatathāgatabalāny anutpāda iti
XXsspp2_3u:556: vikalpayiṣyanti, nānutpādaṃ daśatathāgatabalānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na daśatathāgatabalāny anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodhaṃ daśatathāgatabalānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na daśatathāgatabalāni śāntānīti
XXsspp2_3u:557: vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntaṃ daśatathāgatabalānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na daśatathāgatabalāni viviktānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktaṃ daśatathāgatabalānīti vikalpayiṣyanti.
XXsspp2_3u:558: na catvāri vaiśāradyāni śūnyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatāṃ catvāri
XXsspp2_3u:559: vaiśāradyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na catvāri vaiśāradyāny ānimittānīti
XXsspp2_3u:560: vikalpayiṣyanti, nānimittaṃ catvāri vaiśāradyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na catvāri vaiśāradyāny apraṇihitānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāpraṇihitaṃ catvāri vaiśāradyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na catvāri vaiśāradyāny anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānutpādaṃ catvāri vaiśāradyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na catvāri vaiśāradyāny anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodhaṃ catvāri vaiśāradyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na catvāri vaiśāradyāni śāntānīti
XXsspp2_3u:561: vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntaṃ catvāri vaiśāradyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na catvāri vaiśāradyāni viviktānīti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktaṃ catvāri
XXsspp2_3u:563: na catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatāṃ catasraḥ
XXsspp2_3u:564: pratisaṃvida iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na catasraḥ pratisaṃvida ānimittā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānimittaṃ catasraḥ pratisaṃvida iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'praṇihitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāpraṇihitaṃ catasraḥ pratisaṃvida iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na catasraḥ pratisaṃvido
XXsspp2_3u:565: 'nutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānutpādaṃ catasraḥ pratisaṃvida iti
XXsspp2_3u:566: vikalpayiṣyanti, na catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'nirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:567: nānirodhaṃ catasraḥ pratisaṃvida iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntaṃ catasraḥ pratisaṃvida iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na catasraḥ pratisaṃvido viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:568: na viviktaṃ catasraḥ pratisaṃvida iti vikalpayiṣyanti.
XXsspp2_3u:569: na mahākaruṇāṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatāṃ mahākaruṇeti
XXsspp2_3u:570: vikalpayiṣyanti, na mahākaruṇām ānimitteti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānimittaṃ mahākaruṇeti vikalpayiṣyanti, na mahākaruṇām apraṇihiteti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:571: nāpraṇihitaṃ mahākaruṇeti vikalpayiṣyanti, na mahākaruṇām anutpāda iti
XXsspp2_3u:572: vikalpayiṣyanti, nānutpādaṃ mahākaruṇeti vikalpayiṣyanti, na mahākaruṇām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodhaṃ mahākaruṇeti vikalpayiṣyanti, na mahākaruṇāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntaṃ mahākaruṇeti
XXsspp2_3u:573: vikalpayiṣyanti, na mahākaruṇāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktaṃ mahākaruṇeti vikalpayiṣyanti.
XXsspp2_3u:574: nāṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmān śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatām aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:575: nāṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmān ānimittā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānimittam aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā (ŚsP_II-3_32) iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:576: nāṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmān apraṇihitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāpraṇihitam aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:577: nāṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmān anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānutpādam aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:578: nāṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmān anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodham aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:579: nāṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmān śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntam aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:580: nāṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmān viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktam aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā iti vikalpayiṣyanti.
XXsspp2_3u:581: na srotaāpattiphalaṃ śūnyam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatāṃ srotaāpattiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na srotaāpattiphalam ānimittam iti
XXsspp2_3u:582: vikalpayiṣyanti, na ānimittaṃ srotaāpattiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na srotaāpattiphalam apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāpraṇihitaṃ srotaāpattiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na srotaāpattiphalam anutpāda iti
XXsspp2_3u:583: vikalpayiṣyanti, nānutpādaṃ srotaāpattiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na srotaāpattiphalam anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodhaṃ srotaāpattiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na srotaāpattiphalaṃ śāntam iti
XXsspp2_3u:584: vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntaṃ srotaāpattiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na srotaāpattiphalaṃ viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktaṃ srotaāpattiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:585: na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ śūnyam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatāṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na sakṛdāgāmiphalam ānimittam iti
XXsspp2_3u:586: vikalpayiṣyanti, nānimittaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na sakṛdāgāmiphalam apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāpraṇihitaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na sakṛdāgāmiphalam anutpāda iti
XXsspp2_3u:587: vikalpayiṣyanti, nānutpādaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na sakṛdāgāmiphalam anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodhaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ śāntam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ viviktam
XXsspp2_3u:588: iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:589: nānāgāmiphalaṃ śūnyam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatām anāgāmiphalam iti
XXsspp2_3u:590: vikalpayiṣyanti, nānāgāmiphalam ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānimittam anāgāmiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānāgāmiphalam apraṇihitam iti
XXsspp2_3u:592: (ŚsP_II-3_33) nānāgāmiphalam anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānutpādam anāgāmiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānāgāmiphalam anirodha iti
XXsspp2_3u:594: nānāgāmiphalaṃ śāntam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntam anāgāmiphalam iti
XXsspp2_3u:595: vikalpayiṣyanti, nānāgāmiphalaṃ viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktam anāgāmiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:596: nārhattvaṃ śūnyam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatām arhattvam iti
XXsspp2_3u:597: vikalpayiṣyanti, nārhattvam ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānimittam arhattvam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nārhattvam apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:598: nāpraṇihitam arhattvam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nārhattvam anutpāda iti
XXsspp2_3u:599: vikalpayiṣyanti, nānutpādam arhattvam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nārhattvam anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodham arhattvam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:600: nārhattvaṃ śāntam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntam arhattvam iti
XXsspp2_3u:601: vikalpayiṣyanti, nārhattvaṃ viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktam arhattvam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:602: na pratyekabodhiṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatāṃ pratyekabodhir iti
XXsspp2_3u:603: vikalpayiṣyanti, na pratyekabodhim ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:604: nānimittaṃ pratyekabodhir iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na pratyekabodhim apraṇihiteti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāpraṇihitaṃ pratyekabodhir iti
XXsspp2_3u:605: vikalpayiṣyanti, na pratyekabodhim anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:606: nānutpādaṃ pratyekabodhir iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na pratyekabodhim anirodha
XXsspp2_3u:607: iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodhaṃ pratyekabodhir iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na pratyekabodhiṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntaṃ pratyekabodhir iti
XXsspp2_3u:608: vikalpayiṣyanti, na pratyekabodhiṃ viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktaṃ pratyekabodhir iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:609: na mārgākārajñatāṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatāṃ mārgākārajñateti
XXsspp2_3u:610: vikalpayiṣyanti, na mārgākārajñatām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:611: nānimittaṃ mārgākārajñateti vikalpayiṣyanti, na mārgākārajñatām apraṇihiteti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāpraṇihitaṃ mārgākārajñateti vikalpayiṣyanti, na mārgākārajñatām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:612: nānutpādaṃ mārgākārajñateti vikalpayiṣyanti, na mārgākārajñatām anirodha
XXsspp2_3u:613: iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodhaṃ mārgākārajñateti vikalpayiṣyanti, na mārgākārajñatāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntaṃ mārgākārajñateti
XXsspp2_3u:614: vikalpayiṣyanti, na mārgākārajñatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktaṃ mārgākārajñateti
XXsspp2_3u:615: na sarvākārajñatāṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatāṃ sarvākārajñateti
XXsspp2_3u:616: vikalpayiṣyanti, na sarvākārajñatām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:617: nānimittaṃ sarvākārajñateti vikalpayiṣyanti, na sarvākārajñatām apraṇihiteti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāpraṇihitaṃ sarvākārajñateti vikalpayiṣyanti, na sarvākārajñatām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:618: nānutpādaṃ sarvākārajñateti vikalpayiṣyanti, na sarvākārajñatām anirodha
XXsspp2_3u:619: iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānirodhaṃ sarvākārajñateti vikalpayiṣyanti, na sarvākārajñatāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntaṃ sarvākārajñateti
XXsspp2_3u:620: vikalpayiṣyanti, na sarvākārajñatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktaṃ sarvākārajñateti
XXsspp2_3u:621: na saṃskṛtadhātuṃ śūnya iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatāṃ saṃskṛtadhātur
XXsspp2_3u:622: iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na saṃskṛtadhātum ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na ānimittaṃ saṃskṛtadhātur iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na saṃskṛtadhātum apraṇihita
XXsspp2_3u:623: iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāpraṇihitaṃ saṃskṛtadhātur iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na saṃskṛtadhātum anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānutpādaṃ saṃskṛtadhātur iti
XXsspp2_3u:624: vikalpayiṣyanti, na saṃskṛtadhātum anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:625: nānirodhaṃ saṃskṛtadhātur iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na saṃskṛtadhātuṃ śānta iti
XXsspp2_3u:626: vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntaṃ saṃskṛtadhātur iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na saṃskṛtadhātuṃ viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktaṃ saṃskṛtadhātur
XXsspp2_3u:628: nāsaṃskṛtadhātuṃ śūnya iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śūnyatām asaṃskṛtadhātur
XXsspp2_3u:629: iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāsaṃskṛtadhātum ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na ānimittam asaṃskṛtadhātur iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāsaṃskṛtadhātum apraṇihita iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāpraṇihitam asaṃskṛtadhātur iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:630: nāsaṃskṛtadhātum anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nānutpādam asaṃskṛtadhātur iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāsaṃskṛtadhātum anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:631: nānirodham asaṃskṛtadhātur iti vikalpayiṣyanti, nāsaṃskṛtadhātuṃ śānta iti
XXsspp2_3u:632: vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntam asaṃskṛtadhātur iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:633: nāsaṃskṛtadhātuṃ vivikta iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na viviktam asaṃskṛtadhātur
XXsspp2_3u:635: anena devaputrāḥ paryāyeṇāsyā gambhīrāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃgambhīrāyā evamatarkāyā evamatarkāvacarāyā evaṃsūkṣmāyā evaṃnipuṇāyā evaṃdurdṛśyāyā evaṃduravabodhāyā evaṃśāntāyā evaṃpraṇītāyā (ŚsP_II-3_35) evamalamāryāyā evaṃpaṇḍitavijñavedanīyāyā na kecit pratyeṣitāro bhaviṣyanti. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra na kaścid dharmaḥ sūcyate na paridīpyate. yathaivātra na kaścid dharmaḥ sūcyate na paridīpyate tathaivātra na kaścit sattvaḥ pratyeṣitā bhaviṣyati.
XXsspp2_3u:636: atha āyuṣmān śāradvatīputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: na tv āyuṣman
XXsspp2_3u:637: subhūte iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa trīṇi yānāni vyavasthāpyante.
XXsspp2_3u:638: śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekabuddhayānaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhayānaṃ, bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ saṃparigraha upadiśyate. prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad
XXsspp2_3u:639: daśamaś cittotpādam upādāya bodhisattvamārgaś copadiśyate, yad uta dānapāramitā, śīlapāramitā, kṣāntipāramitā, vīryapāramitā, dhyānapāramitā,
XXsspp2_3u:646: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ,
XXsspp2_3u:647: pañcendriyāṇi, pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāni, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ, catvāry
XXsspp2_3u:648: āryasatyāni, catvāri dhyānāni, catvāry apramāṇāni, catasra
XXsspp2_3u:653: bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānām abhijñāvikrīḍitāny upadiśyante. evaṃkila bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranta upapādukā bhaviṣyanti.
XXsspp2_3u:654: evam abhijñāsv aparihāṇadharmāṇo bhaviṣyanti, buddhakṣetrād buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyanti, yaiś ca kuśalamūlair ākāṅkṣiṣyanti. tān buddhān bhagavataḥ
XXsspp2_3u:655: satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ tāni tathārūpāṇi kuśalamūlāni
XXsspp2_3u:656: samṛdhyanti. yañ ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śroṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:657: sa na kadācid ācchetsyate, yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyanti.
XXsspp2_3u:659: asaṅgapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti, anācchedyapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti.
XXsspp2_3u:660: (ŚsP_II-3_36) sahitapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti, mukṣapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti, śliṣṭapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti, tranyapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti, sarvalokābhyudgataviśiṣṭapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti.
XXsspp2_3u:661: subhūtir āha: evam etad āyuṣman śāradvatīputra evam etat, tathā yathā vadasi vistareṇeha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ trīṇi yānāny upadiṣṭāni śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekabuddhayānaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhayānaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ
XXsspp2_3u:662: saṃparigraha upadiṣṭaḥ, prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad daśamaś cittotpādo bodhisattvamārgaś copadiśyate, yad uta dānapāramitā,
XXsspp2_3u:670: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ,
XXsspp2_3u:671: pañcendriyāṇi, pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāni, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ, catvāry
XXsspp2_3u:672: āryasatyāni, catvāri dhyānāni, catvāry apramāṇāni, catasra
XXsspp2_3u:677: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyābhijñāvikrīḍitāny, upadiśyante. evaṃkila bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranta upapādukā bhaviṣyanti.
XXsspp2_3u:678: evam abhijñāsv aparihāṇadharmāṇo bhavanti, buddhakṣetrād buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyanti, yaiś ca kuśalamūlair ākāṅkṣiṣyanti. tān buddhān bhagavataḥ
XXsspp2_3u:679: satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ tānīmāni tathārūpāṇi kuśalamūlāni
XXsspp2_3u:680: samṛdhyante, yaś ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śroṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:681: sa na kadācid ācchetsyate, yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyanti.
XXsspp2_3u:682: sadāsamāhitāś ca bhaviṣyanty avikṣiptā samāhitayogena. asaṅgapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti, anācchedyapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti, samāhitapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti, yuktapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti, akliṣṭapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti, arthavatpratibhānāś ca (ŚsP_II-3_37) bhaviṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:746: athāyuṣman śāradvatīputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ trīṇi yānāni
XXsspp2_3u:748: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ saṃparigraha upadiśyate. prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad daśamacittotpādo bodhimārgaś copadiśyate, yad uta dānapāramitā, śīlapāramitā, kṣāntipāramitā, vīryapāramitā, dhyānapāramitā,
XXsspp2_3u:755: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ,
XXsspp2_3u:756: pañcendriyāṇi, pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāni, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ, catvāry
XXsspp2_3u:757: āryasatyāni, catvāri dhyānāni, catvāry apramāṇāni, catasra
XXsspp2_3u:762: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyābhijñāvikrīḍitāny upadiśyate. evaṃkila bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranta upapādukā bhaviṣyanti.
XXsspp2_3u:763: evam abhijñāsv aparihāṇadharmāṇo bhaviṣyanti, buddhakṣetrād buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyanti, yaiś ca kuśalamūlair ākāṅkṣiṣyanti. tān buddhān bhagavataḥ
XXsspp2_3u:764: satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ tāni tathārūpāṇi kuśalamūlāni
XXsspp2_3u:765: samṛtsyanti, yañ ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śroṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:766: sa na kadācid ācchetsyate, yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyanti.
XXsspp2_3u:767: sadāsamāhitāś ca bhaviṣyanty avikṣiptasamāhitayogena. asaṅgapratibhānaś ca bhaviṣyanti, anācchedyapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti. samāhitapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti, yuktapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti, śliṣṭapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti, arthavatpratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:768: sarvalokābhyudgataviśiṣṭapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanty anupalambhayogena.
XXsspp2_3u:769: evam ukta āyuṣman subhūtir āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputram etad avocat:
XXsspp2_3u:770: adhyātmaśūnyatām upādāya, āyuṣman śāradvatīputra trīṇi yānāni
XXsspp2_3u:772: yānāni vistareṇopadiśyante, anupalambhayogena, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya trīṇi yānāni vistareṇopadiśyante, anupalambhayogena,
XXsspp2_3u:774: anupalambhayogena, mahāśūnyatām upādāya trīṇi yānāni vistareṇopadiśyante,
XXsspp2_3u:777: yānāni vistareṇopadiśyante, anupalambhayogena, asaṃskṛtaśūnyatām upādāya trīṇi yānāni vistareṇopadiśyante, anupalambhayogena, atyantaśūnyatām upādāya trīṇi yānāni vistareṇopadiśyante, anupalambhayogena,
XXsspp2_3u:781: yānāni vistareṇopadiśyante, anupalambhayogena, sarvadharmaśūnyatām upādāya trīṇi yānāni vistareṇopadiśyante, anupalambhayogena, svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām upādāya trīṇi yānāni vistareṇopadiśyante, anupalambhayogena,
XXsspp2_3u:785: yānāni vistareṇopadiśyante, anupalambhayogena, abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya trīṇi yānāni vistareṇopadiśyante, anupalambhayogena.
XXsspp2_3u:786: prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad daśamacittotpādo bodhisattvamārgaś copadiśyate, yad uta dānapāramitā, śīlapāramitā, kṣāntipāramitā,
XXsspp2_3u:788: adhyātmaśūnyatām upādāya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃparigraha ucyate,
XXsspp2_3u:789: prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad daśamaś cittotpādo bodhisattvamārgaś
XXsspp2_3u:790: copadiśyate, yad uta dānapāramitā, śīlapāramitā, kṣāntipāramitā,
XXsspp2_3u:797: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ,
XXsspp2_3u:798: pañcendriyāṇi, pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāni, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ, catvāry
XXsspp2_3u:799: āryasatyāni, catvāri dhyānāni, catvāry apramāṇāni, catasra
XXsspp2_3u:804: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyābhijñāvikrīḍitāny upadiśyante, evaṃkila bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranta upapādukā bhaviṣyanti.
XXsspp2_3u:805: evam abhijñāsv aparihāṇadharmāṇo bhavanti, buddhakṣetrād buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyanti, yaiś ca kuśalamūlair ākāṅkṣiṣyanti. tān buddhān bhagavataḥ
XXsspp2_3u:806: satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ tāni tathārūpāṇi kuśalamūlāni
XXsspp2_3u:807: samṛtsyanti, yañ ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śroṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:808: sa na kadācid ācchetsyate, yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:809: sadāsamāhitāś ca bhaviṣyanti, avikṣiptāś ca samāhitayogena.
XXsspp2_3u:810: asaṅgapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti, anācchedyapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:811: samāhitapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti, yuktapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:812: śliṣṭapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti, arthavatpratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:813: sarvalokābhyudgataviśiṣṭapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anupalambhayogena.
XXsspp2_3u:814: bahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃparigraha upadiśyate, prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad daśamaś cittotpādo bodhisattvamārgaś copadiśyate, yad uta dānapāramitā, śīlapāramitā,
XXsspp2_3u:821: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ,
XXsspp2_3u:822: pañcendriyāṇi, pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāni, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ,
XXsspp2_3u:823: (ŚsP_II-3_42) catvāry āryasatyāni, catvāri dhyānāni, catvāry apramāṇāni,
XXsspp2_3u:828: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyābhijñāvikrīḍitāny upadiśyante, evaṃkila bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranta upapādukā bhaviṣyanti.
XXsspp2_3u:829: evam abhijñāsv aparihāṇadharmāṇo bhavanti, buddhakṣetrād buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyanti, yaiś ca kuśalamūlair ākāṅkṣiṣyanti. tān buddhān bhagavataḥ

XXsspp2_3u:1089: asaṅgapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti, anārthavatpratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti.
XXsspp2_3u:1090: samāhitapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti, yuktapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:1091: śliṣṭapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti, arthavatpratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:1092: sarvalokābhyudgataviśiṣṭapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anupalambhayogena.

XXsspp2_3u:1101: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ,
XXsspp2_3u:1102: pañcendriyāṇi, pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāni, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ, catvāry
XXsspp2_3u:1103: āryasatyāni, catvāri dhyānāni, catvāry apramāṇāni, catasra
XXsspp2_3u:1108: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyābhijñāvikrīḍitāny upadiśyante. evaṃkila bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranta upapādukā bhaviṣyanti.
