XXsspp2_3u:1197: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ,
XXsspp2_3u:1198: pañcendriyāṇi, pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāni, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ, catvāry
XXsspp2_3u:1199: āryasatyāni, catvāri dhyānāni, catvāry apramāṇāni, catasra
XXsspp2_3u:1204: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyābhijñāvikrīḍitāny upadiśyante. evaṃkila bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranta upapādukā bhaviṣyanti.
XXsspp2_3u:1205: evam abhijñāṃ ca parihāṇadharmāṇo bhavanti, buddhakṣetrād buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyanti, yaiś ca kuśalamūlair ākāṅkṣiṣyanti. tān buddhān bhagavataḥ
XXsspp2_3u:1206: satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ tāni tathārūpāṇi (ŚsP_II-3_56)
XXsspp2_3u:1207: kuśalamūlāni samṛtsyanti, yañ ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād
XXsspp2_3u:1208: dharmaṃ śroṣyanti, sa na kadācid ācchetsyate, yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyanti. sadāsamāhitāś ca bhaviṣyanty avikṣiptāś ca samāhitayogena.
XXsspp2_3u:1209: asaṅgapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti, anārthavatpratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti.
XXsspp2_3u:1210: samāhitapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti, yuktapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:1211: śliṣṭapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti, arthavatpratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti,
XXsspp2_3u:1212: sarvalokābhyudgataviśiṣṭapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anupalambhayogena.
XXsspp2_3u:1214: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasyaitad abhūt: asyāḥ sarvadharmavṛṣṭeḥ subhūtinā sthavireṇa bhāṣyamāṇāyāḥ yan nv ahaṃ puṣyāṇy abhinirmāya buddhaṃ
XXsspp2_3u:1215: bhagavataṃ bodhisattvāṃś ca mahāsattvān bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca subhūtisthaviram asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjākarmaṇe avakireyam abhyavakireyam
XXsspp2_3u:1217: cāturmahārājikā devās trāyastriṃśā devā yāmā devās tuṣitā devāḥ nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devā brahmakāyikā devā brahmapurohitā devā brāhmaparṣadyā devā mahābrahmāṇo devā ābhā devāḥ parīttābhā devā apramāṇābhā devāḥ ābhāsvarā devāḥ śubhā devāḥ parittaśubhā
XXsspp2_3u:1218: devā apramāṇaśubhā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devā bṛhā devāḥ parīttabṛhā devā apramāṇabṛhā devā bṛhatpharā devā abṛhā devā atapā devāḥ sudṛśā devā sudarśanā devā akaniṣṭhā devās teṣām etad abhūvan: asyā dharmavṛṣṭeḥ subhūtinā sthavireṇa bhāṣyamāṇāyāḥ. yaṃ nūnaṃ vayaṃ puṣpāṇy abhinirmāya buddhaṃ bhagavataṃ bodhisattvāṃś ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca subhūtisthavirañ cāsyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjākarmaṇe avikireyam.
XXsspp2_3u:1219: atha khalu śakro devānām indro ye trisāhasramahāsāḥsre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā devāḥ trāyastriṃśā devāḥ yāmā devās tuṣitā devā nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devā brahmakāyikā devā
XXsspp2_3u:1220: brahmapurohitā devā brahmapārṣadyā devā mahābrahmāṇo devā ābhā devāḥ parīttābhā devā apramāṇābhā devā ābhasvarā devāḥ śubhā devāḥ parīttaśubhā devā apramāṇaśubhā devāḥ śubhākṛtsnā devā bṛhā devāḥ parīttabṛhā devā apramāṇabṛhā devā bṛhatphalā devā abṛhā devā atapā devāḥ sudṛśā devāḥ sudarśanā devā akaniṣṭhā devās te sarve divyāni māndāravāni puṣpāṇy abhinirmāya buddhaṃ bhagavataṃ bodhisattvāṃś ca mahāsattvāṃś ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca suhūtisthaviram asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjākarmaṇe
XXsspp2_3u:1221: avikiranti sma, abhyavakiranti sma, abhiprākiranti sma, mahāvarṇakaiś ca taiḥ puṣpaiḥ, ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ puṣpasaṃstarasaṃstṛto
XXsspp2_3u:1222: 'bhūt, upariṣṭhād aṃtarīkṣe trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuḥ pramāṇaḥ puṣpakūṭāgāraḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt ramaṇīyo manoramaḥ,
XXsspp2_3u:1223: sacet subhūteḥ sthavirasyaitad abhūt: na punar imāni puṣpāṇi mayā (ŚsP_II-3_58) sarvadevabhavaneṣv adṛṣṭapūrvāṇi pravaramāṇāni, yānīmāni puṣpāṇi devair abhyavakīrṇāni nirmitānīmāni puṣpāṇi, na staṃbhaniryātāni na sthalajāni na jalajāni yānīmāni puṣpāṇi devaputrair abhyavakīrṇāni manomayānīmāni puṣpāṇi, nemāni stambhaniryātāni, yānīmāni devaputrair abhyavakīrṇāni.
XXsspp2_3u:1224: atha śakro devānām indraḥ subhūteḥ sthavirasya cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtisthaviram etad avocan: aniryātāni bhadanta subhūte imāni puṣpāṇi, na manomayāni na stambhaniryātāni.
XXsspp2_3u:1225: subhūtir āha: yat punaḥ kauśika evaṃ vadasi, aniryātānīmāni puṣpāṇi nemāni
XXsspp2_3u:1226: puṣpāṇi manoniryātāni na stambhaniryātāni, yāni kauśikāniryātāni netāni
XXsspp2_3u:1228: śakra āha: kiṃ punar bhadanta subhūte, imāny eva puṣpāṇy aniryātāni, atha rūpam apy anirjātam evaṃ vedanāpy aniyātā saṃjñāpy aniryātā saṃskārā apy aniryātā vijñānam apy aniryātam.
XXsspp2_3u:1229: subhūtir āha: yat kauśikaivaṃ vadasi, na kauśikemāny eva puṣpāny
XXsspp2_3u:1230: aniryātānīti, rūpam api kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tad rūpaṃ,
XXsspp2_3u:1231: vedanāpi kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā vedanā, saṃjñāpi kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā saṃjñā, saṃskārā api kauśikāniryātā ye cāniryātā na te
XXsspp2_3u:1232: saṃskārāḥ, vijñānam api kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tad vijñānam.
XXsspp2_3u:1233: cakṣuḥ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tac cakṣuḥ, śrotraṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tac chrotraṃ, ghrāṇaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tad ghrāṇaṃ, jihvā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā
XXsspp2_3u:1234: jihvā, kāyaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa kāyaḥ, manaḥ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tan manaḥ.
XXsspp2_3u:1235: rūpaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tad rūpaṃ, śabdaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa śabdaḥ, gandhaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa
XXsspp2_3u:1236: gandhaḥ, rasaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa rasaḥ, sparśaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa sparśaḥ, dharmāḥ kauśikāniryātā ye
XXsspp2_3u:1238: cakṣurvijñānaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ,
XXsspp2_3u:1239: śrotravijñānaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tac chrotravijñānaṃ,
XXsspp2_3u:1240: ghrāṇavijñānaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ,
XXsspp2_3u:1241: jihvāvijñānaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ,
XXsspp2_3u:1242: kāyavijñānaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tat kāyavijñānaṃ,
XXsspp2_3u:1243: (ŚsP_II-3_59) manovijñānaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tan
XXsspp2_3u:1245: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
XXsspp2_3u:1246: śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ,
XXsspp2_3u:1247: ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ,
XXsspp2_3u:1248: jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ,
XXsspp2_3u:1249: kāyasaṃsparśaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na saḥ kāyasaṃsparśaḥ,
XXsspp2_3u:1250: manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa tnanaḥsaṃsparśaḥ.
XXsspp2_3u:1251: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā
XXsspp2_3u:1252: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā, śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
XXsspp2_3u:1253: ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā
XXsspp2_3u:1254: ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā, jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
XXsspp2_3u:1255: kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā
XXsspp2_3u:1256: kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā, manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā kauśikāniryātā yā caniryātā na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā.
XXsspp2_3u:1257: pṛthivīdhātuḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ, abdhātuḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na so 'bdhātuḥ, tejodhātuḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś
XXsspp2_3u:1258: cāniryāto na sa tejodhātuḥ, vāyudhātuḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa
XXsspp2_3u:1259: vāyudhātuḥ, ākāśadhātuḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa ākāśadhātuḥ,
XXsspp2_3u:1260: vijñānadhātuḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa vijñānadhātuḥ.
XXsspp2_3u:1261: avidyā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā avidyā, saṃskārāḥ kauśikāniryātā ye cāniryātā na te saṃskārāḥ, vijñānaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tad vijñānaṃ, nāmarūpaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tan nāmarūpaṃ,
XXsspp2_3u:1262: ṣaḍāyatanaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ, sparśaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa sparśaḥ, vedanā kauśikāniryātā yā
XXsspp2_3u:1263: cāniryātā na sā vedanā, tṛṣṇā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā tṛṣṇā,
XXsspp2_3u:1264: upādānaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tad upādānaṃ, bhavaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa bhavaḥ, jātiḥ kauśikāniryātā yā
XXsspp2_3u:1265: cāniryātā na sā jātiḥ, jarāmaraṇaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na taj
XXsspp2_3u:1267: dānapāramitā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā dānapāramitā, śīlapāramitā
XXsspp2_3u:1268: (ŚsP_II-3_60) kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā śīlapāramitā,
XXsspp2_3u:1269: kṣāntipāramitā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā kṣāntipāramitā,
XXsspp2_3u:1270: vīryapāramitā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā vīryapāramitā,
XXsspp2_3u:1271: dhyānapāramitā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā dhyānapāramitā,
XXsspp2_3u:1272: prajñāpāramitā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā prajñāpāramitā.
XXsspp2_3u:1273: adhyātmaśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sādhyātmaśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_3u:1274: bahirdhāśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_3u:1275: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā, śūnyatāśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā
XXsspp2_3u:1276: śūnyatāśūnyatā, mahāśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā mahāśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_3u:1277: paramārthaśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā paramārthaśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_3u:1278: saṃskṛtaśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_3u:1279: asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_3u:1280: atyantaśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sātyantaśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_3u:1281: anavarāgraśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sānavarāgraśūnyata,
XXsspp2_3u:1282: anavakāraśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sānavakāraśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_3u:1283: prakṛtiśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā prakṛtiśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_3u:1284: sarvadharmaśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā sarvadharmaśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_3u:1285: svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_3u:1286: anupalambhaśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sānupalambhaśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_3u:1287: abhāvaśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sābhāvaśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_3u:1288: svabhāvaśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā svabhāvaśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_3u:1289: abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā.
XXsspp2_3u:1290: smṛtyupasthānāni kauśikāniryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tāni
XXsspp2_3u:1291: smṛtyupasthānāni, samyakprahāṇāni kauśikāniryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tāni samyakprahāṇāni, ṛddhipādāḥ kauśikāniryātā ye cāniryātā na te
XXsspp2_3u:1292: ṛddhipādāḥ, indriyāṇi kauśikāniryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tānīndriyāṇi,
XXsspp2_3u:1293: balāni kauśikāniryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tāni balāni, bodhyaṅgāni kauśikāniryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tāni bodhyaṅgāni, āryāṣṭaṅgo mārgaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ, āryasatyāni kauśikāṃiryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tāni āryasatyāni, dhyānāni kauśikāniryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tāni dhyānāni, apramāṇāni kauśikāniryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tāny apramāṇāni, ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ kauśikāniryātā ye cāniryātā na tā ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ, aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ kauśikāniryātā ye (ŚsP_II-3_61) cāniryātā na tā aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ,
XXsspp2_3u:1294: navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ kauśikāniryātā yāś cāniryātā na tā
XXsspp2_3u:1295: anupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ, śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni kauśikāniryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tāni
XXsspp2_3u:1297: cāniryātā na tā abhijñāḥ, samādhayaḥ kauśikāniryātā ye cāniryātā na te
XXsspp2_3u:1298: samādhayaḥ, dhāraṇīmukhāni kauśikāniryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tāni
XXsspp2_3u:1299: dhāraṇīmukhāni, daśatathāgatabalāni kauśikāniryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tāni daśatathāgatabalāni, catvāri vaiśāradyāni kauśikāniryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tāni catvāri vaiśāradyāṃi, catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ kauśikāniryātā yāś cāniryātā na tāḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ, mahāmaitrī kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā mahāmaitrī, mahākaruṇā kauśikāniryātā yā
XXsspp2_3u:1300: cāniryātā na sā mahākaruṇā, aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ kauśikāniryātā ye cāniryātā na te aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ, srotaāpattiphalaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tac chrotaāpattiphalaṃ, sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tat sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ, anāgāmiphalaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tad anāgāmiphalaṃ, arhattvaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tad arhattvaṃ, pratyekabodhiḥ kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā pratyekabodhiḥ, mārgākārajñatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā mārgākārajñatā, sarvākārajñatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā sarvākārajñatā, srotaāpannaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāo na sa srotaāpannaḥ, sakṛdāgāmī kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa sakṛdāgāmī, anāgāmī kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na so
XXsspp2_3u:1301: anāgāmī, arhat kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na so arhat, pratyekabuddhaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa pratyekabuddhaḥ, bodhisattvaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa bodhisattvaḥ, tathāgataḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa tathāgataḥ.
XXsspp2_3u:1302: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasyaitad abhūt: gambhīraprajño batāyaṃ subhūtisthaviro yatra hi nāma prajñaptiṃ ca na virodhayati dharmatāñ
XXsspp2_3u:1304: atha bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram āmantrayate sma: evam etat kauśikaivam
XXsspp2_3u:1305: etad gambhīraprajño batāyaṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ yatra hi nāmaṃ prajñaptiṃ ca na virodhayati dharmatāṃ copadiśati.
XXsspp2_3u:1306: atha śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat: kathaṃ bhagavan subhūtiḥ
XXsspp2_3u:1307: sthaviraḥ prajñaptiṃ ca na virodhayati dharmatāṃ copadiśati?
XXsspp2_3u:1308: evam ukte bhagavāñ chakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat: rūpaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, vedanā kauśika prajñaptimātrā yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā
XXsspp2_3u:1309: dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, saṃjñā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, saṃskārāḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, vijñānaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati. tat kasya hetoḥ? yā kauśika dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā na
XXsspp2_3u:1310: rudhyate na virudhyate, yā na rūdhyate na virūdhyate tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthavira upadiśati na ca virodhayati.
XXsspp2_3u:1311: cakṣuḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, śrotraṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1312: ghrāṇaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, jihvā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1313: kāyaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, manaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati. tat kasya hetoḥ? yā kauśika dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā na rūdhyate na virūdhyate,
XXsspp2_3u:1314: yā na rudhyate na virudhyate tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthavira upadiśati na ca virodhayati.
XXsspp2_3u:1315: rūpaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, śabdaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1316: gandhaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, rasaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1317: sparśaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, dharmāḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, tat kasya hetoḥ? yā kauśika dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā na rūdhyate na virūdhyate,
XXsspp2_3u:1318: yā na rūdhyate na virudhyate tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthavira upadiśati (ŚsP_II-3_63)
XXsspp2_3u:1320: cakṣurvijñānaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, śrotravijñānaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, ghrāṇavijñānaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1321: jihvāvijñānaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, kāyavijñānaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ
XXsspp2_3u:1322: yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1323: manovijñānaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, tat kasya hetoḥ? yā kauśika dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā na rudhyate na virudhyate, yā na rūdhyate na virūdhyate tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthavira upadiśati na ca virodhayati.
XXsspp2_3u:1324: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1325: jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, kāyasaṃsparśaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati. tat kasya hetoḥ? yā kauśika dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā na rūdhyate na virūdhyate,
XXsspp2_3u:1326: yā na rudhyate na virudhyate tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthavira upadiśati na ca virodhayati.
XXsspp2_3u:1327: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayaveditaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1328: śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayaveditaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1329: ghrāṇasarnsparśapratyayaveditaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1330: jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayaveditaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1332: prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1333: manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayaveditaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, tat kasya hetoḥ? yā kauśika dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā na rudhyate na virudhyate, yā na rudhyate na virudhyate tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthavira upadiśati na ca virodhayati.
XXsspp2_3u:1334: pṛthivīdhātuḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, abdhātuḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1335: tejodhātuḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, vāyudhātuḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ
XXsspp2_3u:1336: yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1337: ākāśadhātuḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, vijñānadhātuḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati. tat kasya hetoḥ? yā kauśika dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā na
XXsspp2_3u:1338: rudhyate na virudhyate, yā na rudhyate na virudhyate tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthavira upadiśati na ca virodhayati.
XXsspp2_3u:1339: avidyā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, saṃskārāḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ
XXsspp2_3u:1340: yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1341: vijñānaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, nāmarūpaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ
XXsspp2_3u:1342: yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1343: ṣaḍāyatanaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, sparśaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1344: vedanā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, tṛṣṇā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1345: upādānaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, bhavaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1346: jātiḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā (ŚsP_II-3_65)
XXsspp2_3u:1347: dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, jarāmaraṇaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, tat kasya hetoḥ? yā kauśika dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā na
XXsspp2_3u:1348: rudhyate na virudhyate, yā na rudhyate na virudhyate tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthavira upadiśati na ca virodhayati.
XXsspp2_3u:1349: dānapāramitā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, śīlapāramitākauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1350: kṣāntipāramitā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, vīryapāramitā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, dhyānapāramitā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1351: prajñāpāramitā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati. tat kasya hetoḥ? yā kauśika dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā na rudhyate na virudhyate, yā na rudhyate na virudhyate tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthavira upadiśati na ca virodhayati.
XXsspp2_3u:1352: adhyātmaśūnyatā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, bahirdhāśūnyatā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1353: śūnyatāśūnyatā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, mahāśūnyatā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ
XXsspp2_3u:1354: yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1355: paramārthaśūnyatā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, saṃskṛtaśūnyatā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1356: atyantaśūnyatā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, anavarāgraśūnyatā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, anavakāraśūnyatā (ŚsP_II-3_66) kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1357: prakṛtiśūnyatā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, sarvadharmaśūnyatā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1358: anupalambhaśūnyatā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, abhāvaśūnyatā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, svabhāvaśūnyatā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1359: abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, tat kasya hetoḥ? yā kauśika dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā na rudhyate na virudhyate, yā na rudhyate na virudhyate tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthavira upadiśati na ca virodhayati.
XXsspp2_3u:1360: smṛtyupasthānāni kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, samyakprahāṇāni kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, ṛddhipādāḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, indriyāṇi kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, balāni kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā
XXsspp2_3u:1361: dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, bodhyaṅgāni kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1362: āryasatyāni kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, dhyānāni kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1363: apramāṇāni kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ kauśika (ŚsP_II-3_67) prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1364: navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati. tat kasya hetoḥ? yā kauśika dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā na rudhyate na virudhyate, yā na rudhyate na virudhyate tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthavira upadiśati na ca virodhayati.
XXsspp2_3u:1365: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1366: abhijñāḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, samādhayaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ
XXsspp2_3u:1367: yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1368: dhāraṇīmukhāni kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, daśatathāgatabalāni kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, catvāri vaiśāradyāni kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1369: catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, mahāmaitrī kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, mahākaruṇā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1370: aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati. tat kasya hetoḥ? yā kauśika dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā na rudhyate na virudhyate, yā na rudhyate na virudhyate tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthavira upadiśati na ca virodhayati.
XXsspp2_3u:1371: srotaāpattiphalaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, anāgāmiphalaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1372: anāgāmiphalaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, arhattvaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ
XXsspp2_3u:1373: yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1374: pratyekabodhiḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat (ŚsP_II-3_68) prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, mārgākārajñatā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ
XXsspp2_3u:1375: sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, sarvākārajñatā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, tat kasya hetoḥ? yā kauśika dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā na rudhyate na virudhyate,
XXsspp2_3u:1376: yā na rudhyate na virudhyate tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthavira upadiśati na ca virodhayati.
XXsspp2_3u:1377: srotaāpannaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, sakṛdāgāmī kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ
XXsspp2_3u:1378: yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1379: anāgāmī kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, arhat kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
XXsspp2_3u:1380: pratyekabuddhaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, bodhisattvaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, tat kasya hetoḥ? yā kauśika dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā na rudhyate na virudhyate,
XXsspp2_3u:1381: yā na rudhyate na virudhyate tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthavira upadiśati na ca virodhayati. evaṃ khalu kauśika subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ prajñaptito na ca virodhayati.
XXsspp2_3u:1382: atha khalv āyuṣman subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat: evam etat kauśika evam etad, tad yathā pi nāma bhagavatā prajñaptimātraṃ
XXsspp2_3u:1383: sarvadharmān upadiṣṭāḥ. evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñaptimātraṃ sarvadharmān viditvā prajñāpāramitāṃ śikṣitavyam.
XXsspp2_3u:1384: evaṃ śikṣamānaḥ punaḥ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpe na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa rūpaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. vedanāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa vedanāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra
XXsspp2_3u:1385: śikṣate. saṃjñāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa saṃjñāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. saṃskāreṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa saṃskārān na samanuupaśyati yatra śikṣate. vijñāne na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa vijñānaṃ na samanupaśyati (ŚsP_II-3_69) yatra
XXsspp2_3u:1387: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś cakṣuṣi na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa cakṣur na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. śrotre na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa śrotraṃ na samanupaśyati yatra
XXsspp2_3u:1388: śikṣate. ghrāṇe na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa ghrāṇaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. jihvāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa jihvāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. kāye na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa kāyaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. manasi na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa mano na samanupaśyati, yatra
XXsspp2_3u:1390: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpe na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_3u:1391: tathā hi sa rūpaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. śabde na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa śabdaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. gandhe na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa gandhaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra
XXsspp2_3u:1392: śikṣate. rase na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa rasaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. sparśe na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa sparśaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. dharmeṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa dharmān na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
XXsspp2_3u:1393: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ cakṣurvijñāne na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa cakṣurvijñānaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
XXsspp2_3u:1394: śrotravijñāne na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa śrotravijñānaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. ghrāṇavijñāne na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_3u:1395: tathā hi sa ghrāṇavijñānaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. jihvāvijñāne na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa jihvāvijñānaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra
XXsspp2_3u:1396: śikṣate. kāyavijñāne na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa kāyavijñānaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. manovijñāne na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_3u:1397: tathā hi sa manovijñānaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
XXsspp2_3u:1398: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśe na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
XXsspp2_3u:1399: śrotrasaṃsparśe na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa śrotrasaṃsparśaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. ghrāṇasaṃsparśe na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa ghrāṇāsaṃsparśaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
XXsspp2_3u:1400: jihvāsaṃsparśe na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa (ŚsP_II-3_70)
XXsspp2_3u:1401: jihvāsaṃsparśaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. kāyasaṃsparśe na śikṣate.
XXsspp2_3u:1402: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa kāyasaṃsparśaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra
XXsspp2_3u:1403: śikṣate. manaḥsaṃsparśe na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa
XXsspp2_3u:1405: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ na
XXsspp2_3u:1406: śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyaya vedanāṃ na
XXsspp2_3u:1407: samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ na śikṣate.
XXsspp2_3u:1408: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ na śikṣate.
XXsspp2_3u:1409: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa ghrāṇāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ na śikṣate,
XXsspp2_3u:1410: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ na samamupaśyati yatra śikṣate. kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ na śikṣate.
XXsspp2_3u:1411: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ na samanupaśyati
XXsspp2_3u:1412: yatra śikṣate. manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra

XXsspp2_3u:1903: parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya, kiṃkāraṇaṃ na kāyasya parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya, kiṃkāraṇaṃ na manasaḥ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya.

XXsspp2_3u:1922: śikṣate nāntardhānāya, kiṃkāraṇaṃ na vijñānadhātoḥ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhanāya.
XXsspp2_3u:1923: kiṃkāraṇaṃ nāvidyāyāḥ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhanāya, kiṃkāraṇaṃ na saṃskārāṇāṃ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhanāya, kiṃkāraṇaṃ na vijñānasya

XXsspp2_3u:1926: kiṃkāraṇaṃ na dānapāramitāyāḥ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhanāya,

XXsspp2_3u:1931: kiṃkāraṇaṃ na prajñāpāramitāyāḥ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhanāya.
XXsspp2_3u:1933: kiṃkāraṇaṃ na bahirdhāśūnyatāyāḥ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhanāya,
XXsspp2_3u:1935: kiṃkāraṇaṃ na śūnyatāśūnyatāyāḥ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhanāya,

XXsspp2_3u:1938: kiṃkāraṇaṃ nābhāvaśūnyatāyāḥ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya, kiṃkāraṇaṃ na svabhāvaśūnyatāyāḥ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya, kiṃkāraṇaṃ nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāḥ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya.

XXsspp2_3u:1943: nāntardhānāya, kiṃkāraṇaṃ na dhyānānāṃ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya,
XXsspp2_3u:1944: kiṃkāraṇaṃ nāpramāṇānāṃ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya, kiṃkāraṇaṃ nārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya, kiṃkāraṇaṃ nāṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya, kiṃkāraṇaṃ nānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya, kiṃkāraṇaṃ na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānāṃ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya, kiṃkāraṇaṃ nābhijñānāṃ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya,
XXsspp2_3u:1945: kiṃkāraṇaṃ na samādhīnāṃ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya, kiṃkāraṇaṃ na dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya, kiṃkāraṇaṃ na tathāgatabalānāṃ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya, kiṃkāraṇaṃ na vaiśāradyānāṃ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya, kiṃkāraṇaṃ na pratisaṃvidānāṃ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhāṇāya, kiṃkāraṇaṃ na mahāmaitryāḥ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya, kiṃkāraṇaṃ na mahākaruṇāyāḥ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya, kiṃkāraṇaṃ nāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya, kiṃkāraṇaṃ na srotaāpattiphalasya parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya, kiṃkāraṇaṃ na sakṛdāgāmiphalasya parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya, kiṃkāraṇaṃ nanāgāmiphalasya parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya, kiṃkāraṇaṃ nārhattvasya parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya, na pratyekabodheḥ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya, kiṃkāraṇaṃ na mārgākārajñatāyāḥ
XXsspp2_3u:1946: parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya, kiṃkāraṇaṃ na sarvākārajñatāyāḥ
XXsspp2_3u:1948: subhūtir āha: tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra rūpasya parigraho nāsti, na hi rūpaṃ rūpaṃ parigṛhṇāti, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya, tathā hi vedanāyāḥ parigraho nāsti, na hi vedanā vedanāṃ parigṛhṇāti,
XXsspp2_3u:1949: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya, tathā hi saṃjñāyāḥ parigraho nāsti, na hi saṃjñā saṃjñāṃ parigṛhṇāti, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya, tathā hi saṃskārāṇāṃ parigraho nāsti, na hi saṃskārāḥ saṃskārān parigṛhṇāti,
XXsspp2_3u:1950: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya, tathā hi vijñānasya parigraho nāsti, na hi vijñānaṃ vijñānaṃ parigṛhṇāti, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya.
XXsspp2_3u:1951: tathā hi cakṣuṣaḥ parigraho nāsti, na hi cakṣuś cakṣuṃ parigṛhṇāti,
XXsspp2_3u:1952: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya, tathā hi śrotrasya parigraho nāsti, na hi śrotraṃ śrotraṃ parigṛhṇāti, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya, tathā hi ghrāṇasya parigraho nāsti, na hi ghrāṇaṃ ghrāṇaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
XXsspp2_3u:1953: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya, tathā hi jihvāyāḥ parigraho nāsti, na hi jihvā jihvāṃ parigṛhṇāti, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya, tathā hi kāyasya parigraho nāsti, na hi kāyaḥ kāyaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
XXsspp2_3u:1954: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya, tathā hi manasaḥ parigraho nāsti, na hi mano manasaṃ parigṛhṇāti, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya.
XXsspp2_3u:1955: tathā hi rūpasya parigraho nāsti, na hi rūpaṃ rūpaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
XXsspp2_3u:1956: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya, tathā hi śabdasya parigraho nāsti, na hi śabdaḥ śabdaṃ parigṛhṇāti, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya, tathā hi gandhasya parigraho nāsti, na hi gandhaḥ gandhaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
XXsspp2_3u:1957: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya, tathā hi rasasya parigraho nāsti, na hi raso rasaṃ parigṛhṇāti, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya, tathā hi sparśasya parigraho nāsti, na hi sparśaḥ sparśaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
XXsspp2_3u:1958: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya, tathā hi dharmāṇāṃ parigraho nāsti, na hi dharma dharmān parigṛhṇāti, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya.
XXsspp2_3u:1959: tathā hi cakṣurvijñānasya parigraho nāsti, na hi cakṣurvijñānaṃ
XXsspp2_3u:1960: cakṣurvijñānaṃ parigṛhṇāti, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya, tathā hi śrotravijñānasya parigraho nāsti, na hi śrotravijñānaṃ śrotravijñānani
XXsspp2_3u:1961: parigṛhṇāti, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya, tathā hi ghrāṇavijñānasya
XXsspp2_3u:1962: parigraho nāsti, na hi ghrāṇavijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
XXsspp2_3u:1964: parigraho nāsti, na hi jihvāvijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
XXsspp2_3u:1965: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya, tathā hi kāyavijñānasya parigraho nāsti,
XXsspp2_3u:1966: na hi kāyavijñānaṃ kāyavijñānaṃ parigṛhṇāti, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām
XXsspp2_3u:1967: upādāya, tathā hi manovijñānasya parigraho nāsti, na hi manovijñānaṃ

XXsspp2_3u:2059: parigṛhṇāti, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya, tathā hi dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2060: parigraho nāsti, na hi dhāraṇīmukhāni dhāraṇīmukhāni parigṛhṇāti,

XXsspp2_3u:2065: upādāya, tathā hi pratisaṃvidāṃ parigraho nāsti, na hi pratisaṃvidaḥ
XXsspp2_3u:2066: pratisaṃvidaḥ parigṛhṇāti, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya, tathā hi mahāmaitryāṃ parigraho nāsti, na hi mahāmaitrī mahāmaitrīṃ parigṛhṇāti,
XXsspp2_3u:2067: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya, tathā hi mahākaruṇāyāḥ parigraho nāsti,
XXsspp2_3u:2068: na hi mahākaruṇā mahākaruṇāṃ parigṛhṇāti, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām
XXsspp2_3u:2069: upādāya, tathā hy āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ parigraho nāsti, na hy āveṇikabuddhadharmā āveṇikabuddhadharmān
XXsspp2_3u:2070: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya, tathā hi sarvajñatāyāḥ parigraho nāsti,
XXsspp2_3u:2071: na hi sarvajñatā sarvajñatāṃ parigṛhṇāti, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām
XXsspp2_3u:2072: upādāya, tathā hi mārgākārajñatāyāḥ parigraho nāsti, na hi mārgākārajñatā
XXsspp2_3u:2073: mārgākarajñatāṃ parigṛhṇāti, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya, tathā hi sarvākārajñatāyāḥ parigraho nāsti, na hi sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñatāṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2075: evaṃ khalv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmaparigrahayogena sarvākārajñatāyāṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2076: āha: evaṃ śikṣamāṇa āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
XXsspp2_3u:2078: subhūtir āha: evaṃ śikṣamāṇa āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati,
XXsspp2_3u:2080: āha: evaṃ śikṣamāṇa āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ parigrahāyāntardhānāya śikṣitvā kathaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati?
XXsspp2_3u:2081: subhūtir āha: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran na rūpasyotpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati
XXsspp2_3u:2082: (ŚsP_II-3_110) nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi rūpaṃ rūpasvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_3u:2083: na vedanāyā utpādaṃ paśyati na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_3u:2084: tathā hi vedanā vedanāsvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_3u:2085: na saṃjñām utpādaṃ paśyati na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_3u:2086: tathā hi saṃjñā saṃjñāsvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_3u:2087: na saṃskārāṇām utpādaṃ paśyati na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi saṃskārāḥ saṃskārasvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_3u:2088: na vijñānasyotpādaṃ paśyati na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_3u:2089: tathā hi vijñānaṃ vijñānasvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
XXsspp2_3u:2090: na cakṣuṣa utpādaṃ paśyati na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_3u:2091: tathā hi cakṣuś cakṣuḥsvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_3u:2092: na śrotrasyotpādaṃ paśyati na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_3u:2093: tathā hi śrotraṃ śrotrasvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_3u:2094: na ghrāṇasyotpādaṃ paśyati na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_3u:2095: tathā hi ghrāṇaṃ ghrāṇasvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_3u:2096: na jihvāyā utpādaṃ paśyati na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati
XXsspp2_3u:2097: (ŚsP_II-3_111) notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi jihvā jihvāsvabhāve na saṃvidyate
XXsspp2_3u:2099: na kāyasyotpādaṃ paśyati na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_3u:2100: tathā hi kāyaḥ kāyasvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_3u:2101: na manasa utpādaṃ paśyati na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_3u:2102: tathā hi mano manaḥsvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
XXsspp2_3u:2103: na rūpasyotpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2104: paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_3u:2105: tathā hi rūpaṃ rūpasvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_3u:2106: na śabdasyotpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2107: paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_3u:2108: tathā hi śabdaḥ śabdasvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_3u:2109: na gandhasyotpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2110: paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_3u:2111: tathā hi gandho gandhasvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_3u:2112: na rasasyotpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2113: paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_3u:2114: tathā hi raso rasasvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_3u:2115: na sparśasyotpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2116: paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_3u:2117: tathā hi sparśaḥ sparśasvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_3u:2118: na dharmāṇām utpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2119: paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ (ŚsP_II-3_112)
XXsspp2_3u:2120: paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi dharmā dharmasvabhāve na saṃvidyate
XXsspp2_3u:2122: na cakṣurvijñānasyotpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2123: paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānasvabhāve na saṃvidyate
XXsspp2_3u:2125: na śrotravijñānasyotpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2126: paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi śrotravijñānaṃ śrotravijñānasvabhāve na saṃvidyate
XXsspp2_3u:2128: na ghrāṇavijñānasyotpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2129: paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi ghrāṇavijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānasvabhāve na saṃvidyate
XXsspp2_3u:2131: na jihvāvijñānasyotpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2132: paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi jihvāvijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānasvabhāve na saṃvidyate
XXsspp2_3u:2134: na kāyavijñānasyotpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2135: paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kāyavijñānaṃ kāyavijñānasvabhāve na saṃvidyate
XXsspp2_3u:2137: na manovijñānasyotpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2138: paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi manovijñānaṃ manovijñānasvabhāve na saṃvidyate
XXsspp2_3u:2140: na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasyotpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati (ŚsP_II-3_113) nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś
XXsspp2_3u:2142: na śrotrasaṃsparśasyotpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2143: paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśasvabhāve na saṃvidyate
XXsspp2_3u:2145: na ghrāṇasaṃsparśasyotpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2146: paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi ghrāṇasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśasvabhāve na saṃvidyate
XXsspp2_3u:2148: na jihvāsaṃsparśasyotpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2149: paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi jihvāsaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśasvabhāve na saṃvidyate
XXsspp2_3u:2151: na kāyasaṃsparśasyotpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2152: paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kāyasaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśasvabhāve na saṃvidyate
XXsspp2_3u:2154: na manaḥsaṃsparśasyotpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2155: paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi manaḥsaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśasvabhāve na saṃvidyate
XXsspp2_3u:2157: na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā utpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati
XXsspp2_3u:2158: nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2159: paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā
XXsspp2_3u:2161: na śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā utpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati
XXsspp2_3u:2162: nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2163: paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā
XXsspp2_3u:2165: na ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā utpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati
XXsspp2_3u:2166: nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2167: paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā
XXsspp2_3u:2169: na jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā utpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati
XXsspp2_3u:2170: nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2171: paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi jihvasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā
XXsspp2_3u:2173: na kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā utpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati
XXsspp2_3u:2174: nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2175: paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā
XXsspp2_3u:2177: na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā utpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati
XXsspp2_3u:2178: nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2179: paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā
XXsspp2_3u:2181: na pṛthivīdhātor utpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2182: paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi pṛthivīdhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātusvabhāve na (ŚsP_II-3_115)
XXsspp2_3u:2184: nābdhātor utpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2185: paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati, tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_3u:2186: tathā hy abdhātur abdhātusvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_3u:2187: na tejodhātor utpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2188: paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tejodhātuḥ tejodhātusvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_3u:2189: na vāyudhātor utpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2190: paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi pṛthivīdhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātusvabhāve na saṃvidyate
XXsspp2_3u:2192: nākāśadhātor utpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2193: paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy ākāśadhātur ākāśadhātusvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_3u:2194: na vijñānadhātor utpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2195: paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi vijñānadhātur vijñānadhātusvabhāve na saṃvidyate
XXsspp2_3u:2197: nāvidyāyā utpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2198: paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_3u:2199: tathā hy avidyāvidyāsvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_3u:2200: na saṃskārāṇām utpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2201: paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi saṃskārāḥ saṃskārasvabhāve na saṃvidyate (ŚsP_II-3_116)
XXsspp2_3u:2203: na vijñānasyotpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2204: paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi vijñānaṃ vijñānasvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_3u:2205: na nāmarūpasyotpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2206: paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi nāmarūpaṃ nāmarūpasvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
XXsspp2_3u:2207: na ṣaḍāyatanasyotpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ

XXsspp2_3u:2244: nādhyātmaśūnyatāyā utpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ

XXsspp2_3u:2348: atha khalu śakro devānām indra āyuṣmantaṃ chāradvatīputram etad avocat:
XXsspp2_3u:2349: prajñāpāramitā bhadanta śāradvatīputra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kuto
XXsspp2_3u:2351: śāradvatīputra āha: prajñāpāramitā devānām indra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ subhūtiparivartā
XXsspp2_3u:2352: atha khalu śakro devānām indra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: tavaiṣa bhadanta subhūte 'nubhāvaṃs tavaitad adhiṣṭhānaṃ yad ārya (ŚsP_II-3_125)
XXsspp2_3u:2353: śāradvatīputra evam āha, subhūtiparivartā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ
XXsspp2_3u:2355: subhūtir āha: na mamaiṣa kauśikānuhāvo na mamaitad adhiṣṭhānam.
XXsspp2_3u:2356: śakra aha: tat kasyaiṣa bhadanta subhūte 'nubhāvaḥ kasyaitad adhiṣṭhānam.
XXsspp2_3u:2359: śakra āha: niradhiṣṭhāṇeṣu bhadanta subhūte sarvadharmeṣu katham evaṃ
